name: Into The Night (Wiggilis)
description:
"Into the Night" is a short survival game based in the catacombs of a church.

The controls are simple, and the plot straight  forward, but can you escape and not die of horror?  Collect the flashlight and find the door, if its locked you can find the keys on the floor.   

A game made for Pre-Fright Game Jam 2019

Credit to: Zachary Kolibas, Devon Hood, Aaron Bailey
